TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VBMath extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用來執行算術運算的程序。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to perform mathematical operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和執行階段程式庫成員，來產生隨機數字。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members for generating random numbers. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rnd`函式來產生隨機整數值範圍是從 1 到 6。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

related.span: Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫成員

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void Randomize() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載`Randomize`方法不採用的種子值。This overload of the `Randomize` method does not take a seed value. 相反地，系統計時器所傳回的值可為新的初始值。Instead, the value returned by the system timer is used as the new seed value. 如果`Randomize`未使用，`Rnd`函式 （不使用引數） 會使用相同的數字做為種子第一次呼叫時，它之後會使用最後產生的數字做為種子值。If `Randomize` is not used, the `Rnd` function (with no arguments) uses the same number as a seed the first time it is called, and thereafter uses the last-generated number as a seed value. > [!NOTE] > 若要重複的隨機數字序列，請呼叫`Rnd`負數的引數，使用之前，立即`Randomize`與數字的引數。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式開頭的種子值，並產生落在有限的範圍內的數字，結果可能會知道用來產生它們的演算法的其他人可預測。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式不應產生密碼編譯隨機數字使用。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Randomize`陳述式來初始化亂數產生器。This example uses the `Randomize` statement to initialize the random-number generator. 由於已省略引數`Randomize`會使用傳回的值從`Timer`做為新的初始值。Because the number argument has been omitted, `Randomize` uses the return value from the `Timer` function as the new seed value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static void Randomize(float64 Number) cil managed

param.name: Number
param.span: 或任何有效的數值運算式。

span.span: An or any valid numeric expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Randomize` 會使用`Number`初始化`Rnd`函式的隨機數字產生器，並賦予它一個新的初始值。`Randomize` uses `Number` to initialize the `Rnd` function's random-number generator, giving it a new seed value. 如果您省略`Number`，系統計時器所傳回的值做為新的初始值。If you omit `Number`, the value returned by the system timer is used as the new seed value. 如果`Randomize`未使用，`Rnd`函式 （不使用引數） 會使用相同的數字做為種子第一次呼叫時，它之後會使用最後產生的數字做為種子值。If `Randomize` is not used, the `Rnd` function (with no arguments) uses the same number as a seed the first time it is called, and thereafter uses the last-generated number as a seed value. > [!NOTE] > 若要重複的隨機數字序列，請呼叫`Rnd`負數的引數，使用之前，立即`Randomize`與數字的引數。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. 使用`Randomize`具有相同的值，如`Number`不會重複先前的序號。Using `Randomize` with the same value for `Number` does not repeat the previous sequence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式開頭的種子值，並產生落在有限的範圍內的數字，結果可能會知道用來產生它們的演算法的其他人可預測。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式不應產生密碼編譯隨機數字使用。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Randomize`陳述式來初始化亂數產生器。This example uses the `Randomize` statement to initialize the random-number generator. 由於已省略引數`Randomize`會使用傳回的值從`Timer`做為新的初始值。Because the number argument has been omitted, `Randomize` uses the return value from the `Timer` function as the new seed value. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

span.span: Returns a random number of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static float32 Rnd() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Returns a random number of type .
The next random number in the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rnd`函式會傳回值小於 1，但大於或等於零。The `Rnd` function returns a value less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero. 然後再呼叫`Rnd`，使用`Randomize`系統計時器為依據的陳述式沒有引數初始化亂數產生器種子。Before calling `Rnd`, use the `Randomize` statement without an argument to initialize the random-number generator with a seed based on the system timer. 若要產生隨機整數指定的範圍中，使用下列公式。To produce random integers in a given range, use the following formula. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#30)] 在這裡，`upperbound`是在範圍內，最高的數字和`lowerbound`是範圍內的最小數字。Here, `upperbound` is the highest number in the range, and `lowerbound` is the lowest number in the range. > [!NOTE] > 若要重複的隨機數字序列，請呼叫`Rnd`負數的引數，使用之前，立即`Randomize`與數字的引數。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式開頭的種子值，並產生落在有限的範圍內的數字，結果可能會知道用來產生它們的演算法的其他人可預測。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式不應產生密碼編譯隨機數字使用。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rnd`函式來產生隨機整數值範圍是從 1 到 6。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static float32 Rnd(float32 Number) cil managed
Public Function Rnd (Number As Single) As Single

param.name: Number
param.span: 值或任何有效的 運算式。

span.span: A value or any valid expression.
Returns a random number of type .

returns.span: 如果數字小於零，Rnd 每次都會產生相同的數字 (利用 當做種子值)。

span.span: If number is less than zero, Rnd generates the same number every time, using as the seed.

returns.span: 如果數字大於零，則 Rnd 會產生序列中的下一個亂數。

span.span: If number is greater than zero, Rnd generates the next random number in the sequence.

returns.span: 如果數字等於零，則 Rnd 會產生最近所產生的數字。

span.span: If number is equal to zero, Rnd generates the most recently generated number.

returns.span: 如果未提供數字，則 Rnd 會產生序列中的下一個亂數。

span.span: If number is not supplied, Rnd generates the next random number in the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rnd`函式會傳回值小於 1，但大於或等於零。The `Rnd` function returns a value less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero. 值`Number`決定如何`Rnd`產生隨機數字。The value of `Number` determines how `Rnd` generates a random number. 對於任何指定的初始種子，因為，都會產生相同的數字序列的每一個後續呼叫`Rnd`函式使用先前產生的數字作為種子序列中下一個數字。For any given initial seed, the same number sequence is generated because each successive call to the `Rnd` function uses the previously generated number as a seed for the next number in the sequence. 然後再呼叫`Rnd`，使用`Randomize`系統計時器為依據的陳述式沒有引數初始化亂數產生器種子。Before calling `Rnd`, use the `Randomize` statement without an argument to initialize the random-number generator with a seed based on the system timer. 若要產生隨機整數指定的範圍中，使用下列公式。To produce random integers in a given range, use the following formula. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#30)] 在這裡，`upperbound`是在範圍內，最高的數字和`lowerbound`是範圍內的最小數字。Here, `upperbound` is the highest number in the range, and `lowerbound` is the lowest number in the range. > [!NOTE] > 若要重複的隨機數字序列，請呼叫`Rnd`負數的引數，使用之前，立即`Randomize`與數字的引數。To repeat sequences of random numbers, call `Rnd` with a negative argument immediately before using `Randomize` with a numeric argument. 使用`Randomize`具有相同的值，如`Number`不會重複先前的序號。Using `Randomize` with the same value for `Number` does not repeat the previous sequence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式開頭的種子值，並產生落在有限的範圍內的數字，結果可能會知道用來產生它們的演算法的其他人可預測。Because the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function start with a seed value and generate numbers that fall within a finite range, the results may be predictable by someone who knows the algorithm used to generate them. 因此，`Random`陳述式和`Rnd`函式不應產生密碼編譯隨機數字使用。Consequently, the `Random` statement and the `Rnd` function should not be used to generate random numbers for use in cryptography. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rnd`函式來產生隨機整數值範圍是從 1 到 6。This example uses the `Rnd` function to generate a random integer value in the range from 1 to 6. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#21)]
